title: My friend gifted me a new icon Summoners Rift Duck two days ago and its gone!
body: Pls help me if you have anything that could help me! {{item:3073}}

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to Player Support and a specialist should be able to check your icon inventory to see if there's any issues!

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

idk if they will help.

I've sent in so many tickets for them to take a season 3 tsm icon they put on my account for whatever reason... it's still there.

> [{quoted}](name=RÃ²ssy,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=cgy6U5ZT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-05-31T10:00:02.163+0000)
>
> idk if they will help.
> 
> I've sent in so many tickets for them to take a season 3 tsm icon they put on my account for whatever reason... it's still there.

Hey Rossy, this is definitely something that I can pass on to the appropriate people. Do you have a ticket number associated with this request?

No, as this was awhile back, i just gave up.

Sorry
